comments:
publishing a Module with depended J2EE Web Library with _separate_ src/bin folders for Tomcat fails with 'java.util.zip.ZipException: duplicate entry: META-INF/MANIFEST.MF'

steps to reproduce: 
1) setup new environment: Eclipse 3.1M3 (gtk-linux), GEF-SDK-3.1.1, JEM-SDK-1.1.0.1, emf-sdo-xsd-SDK-2.1.1, wtp-1.0M9, Tomcat 5.5.12. Register Tomcat as default 'installed runtime'.
2) create a 'Dynamic Web Project' called 'A'
3) create a 'Java Project' called 'B' with _separate_ source and output folders
4) add B as 'J2EE Module Dependecy/Web Library' to A
5) create tomcat launch configuration including A and try to 'publish'

This fails (msg box):

Publishing failed
  Error copying file to {0}: {1}
  duplicate entry: META-INF/MAINFEST.MF

Error log shows:
Publishing failed
  B published successfully
  A published successfully
  Error copying file to {0}: {1}

with the following stacktrace on the last message
  
java.util.zip.ZipException: duplicate entry: META-INF/MANIFEST.MF
at java.util.zip.ZipOutputStream.putNextEntry(ZipOutputStream.java:163)
at org.eclipse.jst.server.core.PublishUtil.addZipEntries(PublishUtil.java:325)
at org.eclipse.jst.server.core.PublishUtil.addZipEntries(PublishUtil.java:317)
at org.eclipse.jst.server.core.PublishUtil.createZipFile(PublishUtil.java:302)
at org.eclipse.jst.server.tomcat.core.internal.PublishOperation2.publishJar(PublishOperation2.java:90)
at org.eclipse.jst.server.tomcat.core.internal.PublishOperation2.execute(PublishOperation2.java:51)
at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.model.ServerBehaviourDelegate.performTasks(ServerBehaviourDelegate.java:747)
at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.model.ServerBehaviourDelegate.publish(ServerBehaviourDelegate.java:568)
at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.internal.Server.doPublish(Server.java:704)
at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.internal.Server.publish(Server.java:693)
at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.internal.PublishServerJob.run(PublishServerJob.java:145)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:76)

Note that it works if you use the project root as source and output folder in B.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 117931 ***
